traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the girallon can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The girallon makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit. reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.
